name: Aldric Goodsworth
title: General Merchant
description: A portly, cheerful merchant with a quick smile and keen eye for business. His shop is packed with everything an adventurer might need, from rope to rations.

greeting.first_time: Welcome, welcome! Aldric Goodsworth at your service. Looking for supplies? You've come to the right place—I've got everything an adventurer needs!
greeting.returning: Ah, back again! What can I get for you today?
greeting.low_gold: Business has been good today—my purse is getting a bit light. I may not be able to buy much more from you right now.

traveling_to_work.text: Morning! Heading to the shop to open up. Stop by if you need supplies!

traveling_home.text: Shop's closed for the night, friend. I'm heading home to rest these old bones. Come back tomorrow!

off_duty.text: I'm off the clock for the evening. Visit me at the Grand Market tomorrow during business hours!

main_menu.text: What brings you to my shop today?

browse_shop.text: Have a look around! All my prices are fair—you won't find better deals in the kingdom.

sell_items.text: Looking to lighten your load? I'll buy most anything you're selling, as long as I have the coin for it.
sell_items.failure: I'm afraid I'm out of coin at the moment. Come back after I've made some sales!

ask_about_stock.text: I restock my shelves every morning with fresh supplies from local craftsmen and traders. If something's out of stock, check back tomorrow!

goodbye.text: Safe travels, friend! Come back anytime!
